p: Table 4 shows the in vitro DPPH scavenging activities of 25 μg/ml, 50 μg/ml, 75 μg/ml, and 100 μg/ml of IGESE in comparison with those of corresponding doses of the standard antioxidant drug (Vit. C) used. IGESE's DPPH scavenging activities were significantly ( p < 0.001 and p < 0.0001) dose related at 75 μg/ml and 100 μg/ml, and these were comparable to that of Vit. C ( Table 4).
